title: The history of the desertion, or, An account of all the publick affairs in England, from the beginning of September 1688, to the twelfth of February following with an answer to a piece call'd The desertion discussed, in a letter to a country gentleman / by a person of quality.
author: Bohun, Edmund, 1645-1699.
notes: Attributed to E. Bohun. Cf. Wing.

"The desertion discuss'd, in a letter to a country gentleman" (p. 137-150) was written by Jeremy Collier in answer to Gilbert Burnet's An enquiry into the present state of affairs. Cf. DNB, v. 11, p. 341.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
